title: (Optional) Configure the SAM deployment size after installation
content:
To change the SAM deployment size after you deploy SAM, run the kubectl edit deployment sam-backend-deployment -n <ESM namespace> command to update sam-backend-deployment based on the following table. 

SAM deployment size Parameters
Small SAM_BACKEND_JVM_PERF_OPTION -Xmx4000m -Xms4000m -Xmn1500m
CPU limits 3
CPU requests 50 million
Memory limits 8 GB
Memory requests 2 GB
Medium SAM_BACKEND_JVM_PERF_OPTION -Xmx9000m -Xms9000m -Xmn3375m
CPU limits 4
CPU requests 50 million
Memory limits 15 GB
Memory requests 4 GB
Large SAM_BACKEND_JVM_PERF_OPTION -Xmx18000m -Xms18000m -Xmn6750m
CPU limits 4
CPU requests 50 million
Memory limits 24 GB
Memory requests 8 GB
